description:
Lelouch Lamperouge finds himself caught in a clash between an anti-government terrorist group and the Britannian army. When things take a turn from bad to worse, a mysterious green-haired girl bestows a dangerous power upon him, changing his life forever.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Tag, an dem ein neuer Dämon geboren wurde
Dzień w którym narodził się zły Bóg
Il giorno in cui nacque il demonio
O dia em que o deus maligno nasceu
The Day a New Demon Was Born
วันที่จอมมารถือกำเนิด
